name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Any evil will be brought to justice!" 
Just now, Putin made a national televised speech. 
He said that the rebellion would be quelled; the organizers of the rebellion betrayed the people; and thanked the Wagner fighters for not causing bloodshed, saying that they were patriots who were deceived. 
Next, they can sign a contract with the Ministry of Defense and return home or go to Belarus. 
The speech did not mention how Prigozhin would be dealt with.

name: 李老师不是你老师

Young people who are unemployed on Xiaohongshu

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
The former vice minister of the Ministry of Commerce said that within ten years, the United States will become the world's largest closed and conservative market
This caused netizens to laugh in the comment area

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A Xiaohongshu netizen posted a post complaining about the "Understanding Contemporary China" series of foreign language textbooks.
This series of foreign language textbooks is filled with a lot of ideological and political content, quotations and Chinese culture. It turns foreign language learning into "external propaganda" learning
A netizen who studies Japanese said that when he opened the textbook, it was full of Chinese words, and he didn't know whether he was learning Japanese or Chinese.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Click carefully] Netizen submission
June 26, Dongying, Shandong, Zhongnan Century Jincheng
A man drove his car and repeatedly ran over a woman.
It was rumored online that the two were husband and wife and had an argument that day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
The incident of rat-head duck resurfaces
On June 27, it was reported online that a woman found what looked like a rat head in the "konjac roast duck" she bought at the cafeteria of Chongqing Xiushan County Traditional Chinese Medicine Hospital.
Subsequent report: The situation is true.
